name: charts_chain
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool defi_data.
Tool description: Free to use API to retrieve data about TVL and coins
API description: Retrieves the historical Total Value Locked (TVL) data for a specified blockchain chain.

chain.description: The slug identifier of the blockchain chain. This can be obtained from the /v1/tvl/chains endpoint or the chains property on /v1/tvl/protocols.
